plot outline: A true love story that originated during 1947 partition of subcontinent revolves around a girl named Pooja(Saima)who is Hindu by descend and a Muslim boy named Bao(Moamar Rana). The story of the movie takes an interesting turn when Bao succeeds in winning Pooja's heart in comparison to Sooria(Babar Ali) who is Pooja fiancé, similarly Lajo(Hina Shaheen)who is engaged to Bao is also eagerly waiting for the love of her life.
title: Channa Sachi Muchi
plot: A true love story that originated during 1947 partition of subcontinent revolves around a girl named Pooja(Saima)who is Hindu by descend and a Muslim boy named Bao(Moamar Rana). The story of the movie takes an interesting turn when Bao succeeds in winning Pooja's heart in comparison to Sooria(Babar Ali) who is Pooja fiancé, similarly Lajo(Hina Shaheen)who is engaged to Bao is also eagerly waiting for the love of her life.::Revive pakistani film
